documents.title: return of the stooges
text: vaudeville act the three stooges is returning to our screens as an animation .
the original trio , larry , curly and moe , did slapstick routines in hugely popular short tv films during the '30s and '40s .
they have now been re-imagined in cartoon form by animation house titmouse .
it is going to produce the 11-minute segments featuring the trio 's trademark farcical humour and limited dialogue .
up until now , the most recent offering for stooges fans was a 2012 farrelly brothers film starring sean hayes , chris diamantopoulos and will sasso ( above ) .
the hollywood reporter said more than 220 films have been made featuring the stooges , so for the uninitiated , there 's plenty of material to check out .
expect a lot of eye-poking .
author: The Hollywood Reporter

documents.title: leona on parting company with cowell
text: leona lewis has told newsbeat she had to leave simon cowell 's record label in order to save her career .
the singer said it became `` complicated '' as syco grew and signed other artists , after she signed following her x factor win in 2006 .
`` it was amazing at first because it was very intimate and there were n't a lot of people working for it , '' she explained .
`` then it grew and grew which is great for them but for me it was n't so great . ''
author: BBC Newsbeat

documents.title: bfi 's lurve season
text: the bfi has announced a uk-wide season dedicated to love later this year .

classic movies such as brief encounter , my beautiful laundrette , when harry met sally , badlands and true romance will be included in the programme , while sunset screenings in the grounds of the british museum will feature films such as a room with a view and the princess bride .
the season will kick off over the august bank holiday weekend and run until the end of december .
details of other events , dvd releases and special guests will be revealed later this year .
ooh-la-la .

documents.title: disclosure reveal album number two
text: dance duo disclosure have er , disclosed details of their second album .
named caracal , after an african wild cat , it is due on 25 september with guest vocals from kwabs , lion babe and gregory porter ( with more to be announced ) .

explaining the title , howard lawrence said : `` a caracal is an incredible wild cat that i became fascinated with while on tour last year ; i just love the way they look , their physical capabilities and their anonymity . ''
an actual real-life caracal stars in the trailer for the record , which you can see

documents.title: ariana grande 's feminist manifesto
text: pop star ariana grande now has one less problem , after getting a rant about sexism in the music industry off her chest .
the singer became annoyed after she was romantically linked to one direction 's niall horan , and wrote a lengthy twitter post saying she was sick of `` double standards '' .
for those of you unable to read 4pt fonts , ariana says :
i ca n't wait to live in a world where people are not valued by who they 're dating but by who they are as an individual .
if a woman even talks about sex openly .
she is shamed !
but if a man talks or raps freely about all the women ( or more commonly used 'bitches'/'hoes ' .
how lovely ) he 's had .
he is regaled .
the double standard and misogyny are still ever present .
the message got taylor swift 's seal of approval , who cheered :
taylor swift
taylorswift13
@ twitterid i 'm so proud of you , always .
but especially today .
`` she will need her sisterhood . ''

documents.title: eurovision down under
text: the aussies really got on board with eurovision this year , when they fielded a contestant for the first time and came a very respectable fifth .
and now they 're really taking it seriously .
the university of melbourne is offering a new first year subject , titled eurovisions , from the faculty of arts in this year 's second semester .
it will study europe `` through the powerful prism of the eurovision song contest '' .

the module will also explore `` the rise of the european union , european integration and expansion , nation branding , as well as the rise of english , and the expression of cultural and social diversity in all its forms .
oh yeah , and then there is also the music ``
students will have to do a 15-minute class presentation plus two 1500 word essays as part of the course .
thankfully , no singing is required .

documents.title: chris riddell 's best drawings
text: whether you 're the new children 's laureate 's biggest fan , or not that familiar with chris riddell 's work , the guardian have put together a selection of his finest illustrations .
look at from the edge chronicles and goth girl , to ottoline and the sleeper and the spindle
author: The Guardian

documents.title: write the theme tune , sing the theme tune
text: it 's three months until comedian stephen colbert takes over from david letterman on the late show , but preparations are in full swing .
last night , he posted a video of himself writing a new theme song for the programme , with the help of some magic markers .
`` what time is it ?
it 's late , '' he sings .
`` what show is it ?
it 's show . ''
a grammy is in the post .

documents.title: say cheese !
text: how 's this for an all-star tony bennett and lady gaga were performing at london 's royal albert hall on monday at part of their cheek to cheek tour .
it was a gala charity concert in aid of wellchild , of which prince harry is a patron , so the royal took the opportunity to pose for a snap with the pair .
we presume sir elton was just along for a good night out and did n't want to miss the photo opportunity .

documents.title: doctor who drama at the royal court
text: audiences in the upstairs theatre at london 's royal court might suspect they 've stumbled into the tardis .
in what could well be a theatrical first , gary owen 's powerful new drama violence and son has a doctor who fan as the central character .

the play opens with 17-year-old liam ( david moorst ) dressed as matt smith 's doctor - complete with fez and bow-tie - returning from a doctor who convention with his friend jen ( morfydd clark ) - an amy pond lookalike .
after a very funny first act ( and doctor who in-jokes ) the drama moves into much darker territory as it explores the relationship between liam and his father rick ( jason hughes ) .
`` stumbling out of the performance tonight i had the distinct impression that this is the most disturbing , even chilling , play of the year , '' wrote the art desk 's aleks sierz
also awarding four stars ,
author: Tim Masters
Entertainment correspondent

documents.title: whispering bob 's showbiz secrets
text: radio 2 's whispering bob harris has penned his memoirs , revealing a wealth of stories about the guests he has encountered over the years .
bob harris : still whispering after all these years : my autobiography is the radio stalwart 's second autobiography .

the daily telegraph has out its favourite 10 anecdotes , including why john lennon was paid in chocolate biscuits to appear on the old grey whistle test and how a number of celebrities were drunk during filming .
author: The Daily Telegraph

find out how jaws misrepresented the great white in our
and the film 's scriptwriter , carl gottlieb , told
something to get your teeth into ?

documents.title: 'doodle every day '
text: illustrator and author chris riddell has been announced as the new children 's laureate .
riddell , who takes over from malorie blackman , wants to encourage `` drawing every day '' as part of his new role - which runs until 2017 .
`` i 'm interested in illustration in all its forms , '' said riddell , creator of the goth girl series .
`` not only in books for children but in posters , prints and performance , as a way of drawing people into books and stories . ''
riddell , 53 , was officially appointed on tuesday at a ceremony at the british academy of film and television arts ( bafta ) in london .
he said he planned to put `` visual literacy '' at the heart of his term of office .
he intends to keep an online visual diary of his time in the role , the laureate 's log , and encourages families to keep their own visual diaries .
speaking to the bbc , riddell said : `` there comes a point where children decide that they ca n't draw .
i want to say , 'do n't stop drawing - carry on , and do a sketch a day . ' ''

documents.title: parks and rec moves to dave
text: the last four seasons of amy poehler 's cult comedy parks and recreation will finally be shown in the uk , after dave won the rights from bbc four .
seasons four and five will be shown on the channel from 27 july , with the last two seasons to follow next year .
in the words of ron swanson : `` great job , everyone .
the reception will be held in each of our individual houses , alone . ''

documents.title: lenny henry 's honour - analysis
text: until the queen 's birthday honours list is officially published , the names are kept secret and the people being honoured are told not to make the news public .
but last weekend , a number of sunday newspapers reported lenny henry was to receive a knighthood .
there have been leaks before .

last year , the cabinet office , which co-ordinates the honours , said there would be an investigation after more than half a dozen names including joan collins and james corden were leaked in advance .
but even after such leaks , it 's almost unheard of for the person being honoured to then publicly confirm the news before the honours list is officially published .
author: Lizo Mzimba
Entertainment correspondent

documents.title: sam smith speaks !
text: sam smith 's just been on the
`` i 'm so relieved i can speak again , it 's been horrible , '' he said .
`` i 've not been able to speak for three weeks , it was horrendous .
but i 've got through it , everyone 's been so amazing about it . ''
back in april , the 23-year-old was forced to pull out of his australian tour due to bleeding on his vocal cords .
he told radio 1 he 'd been `` singing too hard for too long '' and although it `` killed me cancelling all these shows '' , the enforced rest was a `` blessing in disguise '' .
he survived being mute by doing `` a lot of miming '' and typing words for his mobile phone to speak for him , adding : `` but it does n't swear , which is annoying as i swear a lot . ''
he said so far he has only tried singing in the shower : `` i 'm taking it slowly .
i 've got two more weeks chill time and my first show is july 3 , when i 'm back on the normal schedule , which is great . ''
author: BBC Radio 1

documents.title: top gear trailer
text: fans of top gear can now
the episode will feature two films shot before clarkson was suspended from top gear and eventually sacked .
the trailer , currently only available for people in the uk , also shows richard hammond and james may presenting links from the studio , with clarkson noticeably absent .
no date has been given for transmission , and the bbc has yet to decide how top gear may return .

documents.title: stars call to save bbc three
text: more than 700 celebrities including daniel radcliffe , olivia colman and jack whitehall have signed a letter calling for plans to move bbc three online to be shelved .

`` disastrously , the closure and move online will remove at a stroke a vitally important outlet for new talent and innovative ideas , where some of the most successful and influential names currently working in british television were given their first chance , '' the letter says .
the proposal to move bbc three online is part of the corporation 's cost-cutting plans and is set to make savings of around £ 50m .
author: BBC Newsbeat

documents.title: lenny 's hard to keep secret
text: although these things are meant to be kept secret - the official announcement is due on friday - it seems lenny henry is just too excited about being offered a knighthood to keep his lips sealed .
he told radio 2 's chris evans the honour was `` wonderful '' .
`` it was a lovely feeling - it was like being filled with lemonade for 10 or 15 minutes , but as people found out and started to ring it was a bit overwhelming , '' he said .
the comic relief founder said his late mother would have been `` chuffed '' with the honour , adding he regarded it as recognition for everyone who had worked for the charity .

documents.title: apple music reaction
text: another day , another music app .
but this one ,
apple music promises to combine a streaming song and music video library , an internet radio station and a way for artists to share unreleased tracks and other material .
so what do people think ?
what do you think ?
tweet

documents.title: sir elton apology
text: sir elton john has apologised to a steward after lambasting her for trying to stop concert-goers blocking the view of other fans at his gig in gloucester on sunday night .
in an expletive-laden outburst , he shouted from the stage : `` i came here to play music , now all you stewards down there , especially the woman in the ponytail lighten up , will you ?
`` this is not china . ''
he later apologised , telling the audience : `` it 's not good enough to say that .
whoever told the stewards to be that strict , that 's their fault and not hers , and i apologise and i will be willing to apologise to her face . ''
he then brought the steward on stage to give her a hug and share his piano stool with her , telling her : `` no-one should ever talk to a lady like that .
i 'm very , very apologetic . ''
so for once , sorry did n't seem to be the hardest word .
boom boom .

documents.title: rip mary ellen trainor
text: but first we bring you sad news of the death of character actress mary ellen trainor .

she starred in some of the biggest films of the 1980s , including a police psychiatrist in mel gibson 's lethal weapon films and its sequels , a television reporter in die hard and mrs walsh - the mother of two main characters in the goonies .
she also had a part in ghostbusters ii .
lucasfilm president kathleen kennedy confirmed on monday the actress died at her home in montecito , california , on 20 may .
she was 62 .
trainor was married to hollywood director robert zemeckis , who cast trainor in her first film , romancing the stone , as the kidnapped sister of kathleen turner 's character .
the pair divorced in 2000 .
they had one child together , alex zemeckis .
a memorial service will be held on 19 june in montecito .

documents.title: get involved
text: as ever , we 'd like to hear your views on today 's news - or anything else you think we should be reporting .
tweet
author: Genevieve Hassan
Entertainment reporter

documents.title: good morning
text: morning all .

welcome to the world of arts and entertainment - we 've got plenty lined up for you today , including an apology from sir elton john , stars joining the fight to keep bbc three on tv and prince harry meeting lady gaga at a charity concert .
stay tuned !
author: Emma Saunders
Arts and Entertainment reporter
